field.name: summary
field.value: Class proxy with target forwards mixin methods not implemented by proxied class to wrong target

field.name: description
field.value:
This is similar scenario to DYNPROXY-180 except this time related to mixins.
If we create proxy for class Foo (which doesn't implement IBar), use FooBar (which does implement IBar) as target and mix in Bar (which also implements IBar) into the proxy when calling a bar method it should be forwarded to the proxy's target FooBar instance. Currently the target is being ignored and the call is forwarded to the mixin Bar.
